summary: A remodeled Imperial Full Helmet so you can actually see your face while killing Stormcloaks.
descriptionHtml:
This is a remodeled Imperial Full Helmet I made based on the original Bethesda meshes, because it annoyed me that I could not see my character's face while wearing one of the best looking helmets in the game. That said, this model lets you see your char's face behind the visor but leaves the general style untouched imo.

This includes just meshes, no textures, so it should be compatible with every retexture mod.
.esp is required to change the equipment slot the helmet uses, so your head is not removed when you equip it.

Argonian models are delayed until I have more time again. Thanks for your patience.

Update 0.9.1
Khajiit added, but leads to problem with elven ears clipping through the helmet. So if you don't plan on using it on Khajiit, stay with v0.9. [s]There also seems to be an CTD issue, in this case revert to v0.9 untill I can fix this.[/s]
I could not reproduce the CTD, so i assume it's not from this mod (alone).

v0.9
For now just the human/elven version, no Argonians and Khajiit. When wearing this helmet on an Argonian/Khajiit it will not be displayed (and your hair will vanish). I will add meshes for beastraces later on maybe.

The textures in the ingame screenshots are Paddyy's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8717]HQ Textures[/url]
author: Izea
